snippet: The arrest of Don Vaccaro, the head of TicketNetwork, has sent his political supporters scattering as the online ticket industry faces increasing scrutiny.
abstract: Arrest of TicketNetwork chief executive Don Vaccaro sends his political supporters scattering as the online ticket industry faces increasing scrutiny; firm, national online marketplace for secondhand tickets, has lobbied aggressively for legislation that would benefit ticket scalpers, like a bill to ban so-called paperless ticketing; arrest, along with Connecticut consumer protection report criticizing scalping market, could complicate company's political fortunes, which have been far reaching beyond the ticket industry.
lead_paragraph: The arrest of Don Vaccaro, the head of TicketNetwork, has sent his political supporters scattering as the online ticket industry faces increasing scrutiny.
